articles.title: Russian Jet Dumps Fuel On US Drone, Then Collides With It Over Black Sea - NDTV
articles.description: A Russian Su-27 jet fighter collided with an American MQ-9 Reaper drone over the Black Sea on Tuesday, the US military's European Command said.
articles.content:
"Unsafe and unprofessional act by the Russians nearly caused both aircraft to crash," US said.
